title: -C lto doesn't work with plugins
body:
Cargo.toml:

``` toml
[package]
name = "test"
version = "0.0.1"
authors = ["Pierre Krieger <pierre.krieger1708@gmail.com>"]

[profile.dev]
lto = true

[dependencies.glium_macros]
git = "https://github.com/tomaka/glium"
```

src/main.rs:

``` rust
#![feature(plugin)]
#![plugin(glium_macros)]

fn main() {}
```

Running `cargo build`:

```
pierre@pierre-HP-ProBook-4740s:~/Projets/test$ cargo build --verbose
       Fresh glium_macros v0.0.1 (https://github.com/tomaka/glium#046f73a3)
   Compiling test v0.0.1 (file:///home/pierre/Projets/test)
     Running `rustc src/main.rs --crate-name test --crate-type bin -C lto -g --out-dir /home/pierre/Projets/test/target --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/home/pierre/Projets/test/target -L dependency=/home/pierre/Projets/test/target/deps --extern glium_macros=/home/pierre/Projets/test/target/deps/libglium_macros-0d63a9614c44c703.so`
error: could not find rlib for: `glium_macros`
Could not compile `test`.

Caused by:
  Process didn't exit successfully: `rustc src/main.rs --crate-name test --crate-type bin -C lto -g --out-dir /home/pierre/Projets/test/target --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/home/pierre/Projets/test/target -L dependency=/home/pierre/Projets/test/target/deps --extern glium_macros=/home/pierre/Projets/test/target/deps/libglium_macros-0d63a9614c44c703.so` (status=101)
```

Note that this is not specific to `glium_macros`.

Version is `rustc 1.0.0-nightly (a954663db 2015-02-10 22:08:30 +0000)`
